text: fa-is'tajaba lahum rabbuhum anni la udiʿu ʿamala ʿamilin minkum min dhakarin aw untha baʿdukum min baʿdin fa-alladhina hajaru wa-ukh'riju min diyarihim waudhu fi sabili waqatalu waqutilu la-ukaffiranna ʿanhum sayyiatihim wala-ud'khilannahum jannatin tajri min tahtiha l-anharu thawaban min ʿindi l-lahi wal-lahu ʿindahu hus'nu l-thawabi
